|info          = '''{{Control|Tap|Press|Press}}'''<br>Leaps into the air with all the agility of a cat passing through the bushes, and thwacks her foes with a flying kick that deals {{Color|AoE Dendro DMG}} while creating a Shield of Safe Transport. This will also briefly apply {{Dendro}} to Kirara.<br>The shield will absorb {{Color|Dendro DMG}} with 250% effectiveness. The shield's DMG absorption will be based on Kirara's Max [[HP]] and will not exceed a certain percentage of that Max HP. The remaining DMG absorption on a Shield of Safe Transport will stack on a new one when it is created, and its duration will reset.<br><br>'''Hold'''<br>Out of her desire to "deliver within half a day," Kirara deploys a Shield of Safe Transport identical to the one that can be created by {{Control|tapping|pressing|pressing}} the skill. She will also curl up into a special express delivery box, entering the Urgent Neko Parcel state in order to move and fight more swiftly.<br><br>'''Urgent Neko Parcel'''<ul><li>Deals Dendro DMG to opponents she crashes into. This effect can be triggered once on each opponent every 0.5s.</li><li>When in this state, Kirara's movement speed, climbing speed, and jumping power are all increased, and her Stamina Consumption from climbing is increased.</li><li>When the duration ends or the skill is used again, a Flipclaw Strike more powerful than the attack in the {{Control|Tap|Press|Press}} Mode will be unleashed, dealing {{Color|AoE Dendro DMG}}.</li><li>The Urgent Neko Parcel state lasts a maximum of 10s. When the state ends, the skill will enter CD. The longer Kirara spends in this state, the longer the CD will be.</li><li>Sprinting or actively canceling climbing will end this state early.</li></ul>

{{Description|"So you wanna know the secret to speedy deliveries? Well, it's all in the legs!"}}
'''Meow-teor Kick''' is [[Kirara]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This skill generates '''3''' [[elemental particles]] when pressed and with the final hit when held, if it hits at least 1 target. Additionally, when held, '''1''' particle is generated when it hits an enemy, with a cooldown of 4s.
* {{Talent Note|snapshot|Urgent Neko Parcel Hit DMG|character=Kirara}}
** This does not apply to Flipclaw Strike DMG upon exiting the Urgent Neko Parcel state.
* While in the Urgent Neko Parcel state:
** Kirara must be moving in order to deal DMG, even if she is contacting an enemy.
** Kirara's movement is not affected by [[Movement Speed]]. However, if Kirara is in Walking Mode, the parcel will move slower too.
** Climbing Stamina cost is increased by '''140%'''.
** Kirara cannot [[Climbing#Climb Jump|climb jump]] or perform [[Plunging Attack]]s.
** If Kirara reaches a certain speed while falling, she will exit the Urgent Neko Parcel state.
** Opening the [[Wind Glider]] or interacting with certain exploration objects (e.g. [[Thunder Sphere]]s, [[Four-Leaf Sigil]]s) will end the Urgent Neko Parcel state.
